description.value:
Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Range 60 feet; Target 1 willing creature

Duration [[@actor.flags.pf2e.limit-rank]] round(s)

You strengthen an ally with the power of the moon, allowing them to act quickly and use their alliesâ€™ positioning to help watch their backs. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}, and can use the extra action to Stride, Step, or Strike. The target also gains a +1 status bonus to AC for each ally within 30 feet of them at the time of Lunatic High's activation.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feat-effects.Item.QtYtFOCUhi3KWO87]{Effect: Lunatic High}
